document_data.caption: An Arcadian avenger.
document_data.name: Arcadian Avenger
document_data.subtype3e: [[:Category:Creatures with the good subtype|Good]], [[:Category:Creatures with the lawful subtype|lawful]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Arcadian avengers''' were militant [[outsider]]s that acted as defenders of the planes of [[Arcadia]] and the [[House of the Triad]]. They could be summoned by the ''[[summon monster IV]]'' or the ''[[planar ally]]'' spells.
document_data.Description: All Arcadian avengers looked remarkably similar, resembling winged [[human]] women of athletic build standing {{SI|5'8|ft-in|long=yes}} tall, their skin and wings seemingly made of a silver-like metal.
document_data.Personality: In accordance with the ideals of Arcadia, most Arcadian avengers were of a [[lawful good]] bent, but a number of them that dispassionately valued the rule of law over benevolence fell into [[lawful neutral]]ity.
document_data.Combat: Arcadian avengers wore armor seemingly made of the same metal as their skin and wings. They also wielded a pair of masterfully crafted [[longsword]]s.
document_data.Society:
In the Peaceable Kingdoms of Arcadia, Arcadian avengers lived in grand barracks on the plane's second layer, [[Buxenus]].

Within the House of the Triad, a large group of Arcadian avengers were loyal to [[Helm]].
